ygData.subject: RE: Cleric Heals Resisted
ygData.msgSnippet: According to everything I have ever read, Magic Resistance has always had the chance of working for OR against you. If you have enough stat-increasing items to
ygData.messageBody:
According to everything I have ever read, Magic Resistance has always had
the chance of working for OR against you. If you have enough stat-increasing
items to raise your MR into the 90 percentile, then most spells (even Heals)
have a chance of being resisted. I believe it's in the manual too, could be
wrong, but I will double-check tonight.

Drizben D'vorn
Defiled Priest of Innoruuk


> From: "Nick Shaffner" <nicks@...>
>
> Has anyone been able to confirm or deny that healing spells now have a
> chance of being resisted by other players on the test server?
>
> --
> Nindar - High Elven Cleric Of Tunare - The Rathe
>
>
>
